name: Aqua Cat
description:
Aqua Cat Game inspired by Minato Aqua's cover of Nyan Cat -

Made by Rex Wang in Unity with help from Paul Foster

Make sure the game plays in full-screen.

Esc / P to Pause, mouse position controls Aqua by default, C to change input between Keyboard and Mouse.

Esc / Pで一時停止、マウスポジションでAquaをデフォルトで操作、Cでキーボードとマウスの間で入力を変更。

Item details on pause menu.

v1.1 - added pause menu, added keyboard inputs

v1.2 - increased difficulty scaling speed, added item wobble at 4 difficulty, dropping items at 8 difficulty.

v1.3 - added item glows.
